definitions.definition: A line on a chart linking rock of the same age (as determined from isotope ratios).

A collection of points (such as a manifold ), each point representing a set of initial conditions for a given dynamical system , such that every set results in the same long-term behaviour of the system.

main_definition: ( geology , geochemistry ) A line on a chart linking rock of the same age (as determined from isotope ratios).
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics , dynamical systems ) A collection of points (such as a manifold ), each point representing a set of initial conditions for a given dynamical system , such that every set results in the same long-term behaviour of the system.
